<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>We are removing the restriction of content, profile combination for controls, risks, so that users can create multiple risks or controls for same entity and content combination.</description>
        <name>Dropping the Unique Index on GRC item</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var tableName = "sn_grc_item";
var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_grc_item');
if (gr.isValid()) {
    var isUniqueIndex = true;
    var columnsInIndex = ["content", "profile"];
    var util = new GlideIndexUtils();
    var droppedIndexCount = util.dropByExactElementSequence(tableName, isUniqueIndex, columnsInIndex);
    if (droppedIndexCount == 1) {
        gs.info("Dropped unique index on column 'content, profile' in 'sn_grc_item' table");
    }
}]]></script>
